channel.title: Cant make admins in custom source
channel.description:
ive been trying to make ppl to admins, mods too, i put rthe character-rights to 2 , the player logs in but its still 0...
whats the problem? i have tried already 2 sources but nothing, changes to 0

item.title: Cant make admins in custom source
item.dc:creator: @Click_Here Click Here
item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

[quote=“csrsniper254, post:5, topic:51364”]Once again an incorrect post by click… well here you go…

NOTE: This is for the Pimpscape source. Tell me if you need another source.

Search for:

//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

You should see this:

/*checkmods(); checkadmins(); checkstaff(); if(checkmods() == 5) playerRights = 1; if(checkadmins() == 5 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Mod Ryan")) playerRights = 2; if(checkstaff() == 5 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("mod darren")) playerRights = 3;*/

Erase it all and put this:

/*checkmods(); checkadmins(); checkstaff(); if(checkmods() == 5) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Mod name here")) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Mod name here")) playerRights = 1; if(checkadmins() == 5 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Admin name here")) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Admin name here")) playerRights = 2; if(checkstaff() == 5 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Owner Name Here")) playerRights = 3;*/

Make sure to put the names of the people on your server in the “”[/quote] rofl w.e its called helping noob get used 2 it.

Read full topic
item.source: Cant make admins in custom source

NOTE: This is for the Pimpscape source. Tell me if you need another source.

Search for:

//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

You should see this:

/*checkmods(); checkadmins(); checkstaff(); if(checkmods() == 5) playerRights = 1; if(checkadmins() == 5 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Mod Ryan")) playerRights = 2; if(checkstaff() == 5 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("mod darren")) playerRights = 3;*/
